nodes.description: Sana新闻 agency 报道在苏韦达市场发生一起自杀袭击
nodes.support_text: State news agency Sana earlier reported one suicide attack at a market in Suweida

nodes.description: 安全部队在阻止袭击者自爆前击毙两人
nodes.support_text: security forces had killed two other attackers before they could blow themselves up

nodes.description: 武装分子对苏韦达东北部三个村庄发动袭击
nodes.support_text: Militants also attacked three villages north-east of the city
